title: A Port for Abu Dhabi
brief_description: Credits: Script, Wolf Kielich sound, Rob Bloemendal;”SUMMARY: Shows the development of Abu Dhabi as a rich oil exporting area and the construction of the port facilities necessary to its future growth”
